result.eng: She will cut your head off if she sees you!
result.ga: Bainfidh sí an ceann díot má fheiceann sí thú
result.orig: Bainfidh sí an ceann díot má fheiceann sí thú
result.html: Bainfidh sí an ceann díot má fheiceann sí thúShe will cut your head off if she sees you!
result.ponchtml: Bainfiḋ sí an ceann díot má ḟeiceann sí ṫúShe will cut your head off if she sees you!

result.html: Bhí a cheann cromthaHis head was bowed.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí a ċeann cromṫaHis head was bowed.

result.html: Chroith an captaen a cheannThe captain shook his head.
result.ponchtml: Ċroiṫ an captaen a ċeannThe captain shook his head.

result.html: D'ardaigh an t-éan a cheannThe bird raised his head.
result.ponchtml: D'ardaiġ an t-éan a ċeannThe bird raised his head.

result.eng: He doesn't have much hair on his head.
result.ga: Níl mórán gruaige ar a cheann
result.orig: Níl mórán gruaige ar a cheann
result.html: Níl mórán gruaige ar a cheannHe doesn't have much hair on his head.
result.ponchtml: Níl mórán gruaige ar a ċeannHe doesn't have much hair on his head.

result.eng: They were trying not to hurt the animal in the head.
result.ga: Bhí siad ag iarraidh gan an t-ainmhí a ghoin sa cheann
result.orig: Bhí siad ag iarraidh gan an t-ainmhí a ghoin sa cheann
result.html: Bhí siad ag iarraidh gan an t-ainmhí a ghoin sa cheannThey were trying not to hurt the animal in the head.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí siad ag iarraiḋ gan an t-ainṁí a ġoin sa ċeannThey were trying not to hurt the animal in the head.

result.eng: The pilot was hit in the head but the airplane landed safely.
result.ga: Buaileadh an píolóta sa chloigeann ach thuirling an t-eitleán slán sábhailte
result.orig: Buaileadh an píolóta sa chloigeann ach thuirling an t-eitleán slán sábhailte
result.html: Buaileadh an píolóta sa chloigeann ach thuirling an t-eitleán slán sábhailteThe pilot was hit in the head but the airplane landed safely.
result.ponchtml: Buaileaḋ an píolóta sa ċloigeann aċ ṫuirling an t-eitleán slán sáḃailteThe pilot was hit in the head but the airplane landed safely.

result.eng: He wouldn't take his head out of the drink. He wouldn't stop drinking.
result.ga: Ní raibh a cheann le tógáil aige as ólachán
result.orig: Ní raibh a cheann le tógáil aige as ólachán
result.html: Ní raibh a cheann le tógáil aige as ólachánHe wouldn't take his head out of the drink. He wouldn't stop drinking.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ a ċeann le tógáil aige as ólaċánHe wouldn't take his head out of the drink. He wouldn't stop drinking.

result.eng: The night is coming, where will I rest my head?
result.ga: Tá an oíche ag teacht agus cá leagfaidh mé mo cheann
result.orig: Tá an oíche ag teacht agus cá leagfaidh mé mo cheann
result.html: Tá an oíche ag teacht agus cá leagfaidh mé mo cheannThe night is coming, where will I rest my head?
result.ponchtml: Tá an oíċe ag teaċt agus cá leagfaiḋ mé mo ċeannThe night is coming, where will I rest my head?

result.eng: Where will I rest my head tonight?
result.ga: Cá háit a leagfaidh mé mo cheann go maidin
result.orig: Cá háit a leagfaidh mé mo cheann go maidin
result.html: Cá háit a leagfaidh mé mo cheann go maidinWhere will I rest my head tonight?
result.ponchtml: Cá háit a leagfaiḋ mé mo ċeann go maidinWhere will I rest my head tonight?
